long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need helping booking a covid vaccine appointment at a NY State location? Then you've come to the right place! Use this chrome extension to help navigate the tedious appointment booking process to find that perfect appointment for you.

How to use:
1. Go to https://am-i-eligible.covid19vaccine.health.ny.gov/
2. Fill out the form to make sure you are eligible
3. Navigate to your location of choice
4. Click the red box at the top left
5. Fill in desired time constraints
6. Wait a few minutes and hopefully it will find you a spot!
7. Fill in all your personal details.

If you have any questions feel free to reach out to me at harryledley@gmail.com . I may be slow in responding to any requests.
